page.title: 18SHREWLEY AREA'S CONCERNS
page.content: The majority of people in the Shrewley area were very concerned about two major issues: (1) the new motorway the M40 which will run through the Rowington farmland area; and (2) the eight new industrial units which are going to be built at the south end of Little Shrewley. The motorway will spoil the country- side and divert several roads. There- fore a decision was made, a protest group rose and action was taken. The industrial units would also spoil the landscape and the peacefulness of the country which was the very reason why most people lived there. People didn't mind the lack of amen- ities available in the area. The maj- ority went shopping either in Warwick or Leamington Spa about once a week.
